skills.name: Fire Horn
skills.description: Attacks and Stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 25% chance. The damage increases accordingly to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.multiplier_formula: 1.8*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.12*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Nature's Protection
skills.description: Creates a shield that's 30% of your MAX HP for 3 turns and creates a shield that's 20% of your MAX HP on all other allies for 2 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Shield +5%
Shield +5%
Shield +10%
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Shield
skill_effect.description: A shield is created to absorb a portion of incoming damage

skills.name: Eternal Flame (Passive)
skills.description: Reduces damage dealt by Water attributes by 50%. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Decrease Damage
skill_effect.description: Decreases damage received by a certain amount

skills.name: Transformation: Human Form
skills.description: Transforms into a Human Form and you'll be able to use a new skill. The Attack Power will be increased proportionate to your MAX HP in Human Form, but your MAX HP will be decreased by 50%. Instantly gains another turn after the transformation.
